dict.string: Permission required for accessing documents related to your account and transactions, ensuring secure access and management.
Permission required for profile picture changes, document uploads, and saving account statements. Your data is securely stored on our servers with no sharing to third parties.
Permission required to send you critical banking alerts that bypass Do Not Disturb settings, ensuring you receive important notifications promptly.
Permission required to send notifications about account activity, transfers, bill payments, and other essential updates.
Permission required to save account statements or receipts to your photo library. Data is securely transferred with no third-party sharing.

Permission required for accessing media files during onboarding or profile updates. No third-party sharing is involved.
Permission required for capturing images for KYC verification and document uploads. All data is securely stored with no external sharing.
Permission required for secure biometric login to enhance user authentication and security.
Permission required to access local network details, including Wi-Fi information, to improve connectivity for banking services.
Permission required to display nearby branches, ATMs, and other banking services, ensuring compliance with security guidelines.
Permission required to display nearby branches and ATMs even when the app is running in the background, ensuring you have access to essential banking services.
Permission required to access your location to provide banking services relevant to your region.
Permission required to access your location while using the app to find nearby branches and ATMs, ensuring you receive relevant information.
Permission required for accessing your photo library to upload documents and update profile pictures. Data is securely handled with no third-party sharing.
Permission required to import contacts for payment transfers or to share banking information securely.
